Dialogue.Page: This body is not in hydrostatic equilibrium, and has a prolate shape.
Gravitational scans indicate the world has a low density - Hypothesis: This planet has deep cave systems.
This body is not in hydrostatic equilibrium, and has a prolate shape.
Gravitational scans indicate the world has a low density - Hypothesis: This planet has deep cave systems.
(Install <color="purple">Finis</color> to learn more about this world!)
This body is not in hydrostatic equilibrium, and has a prolate shape.
Gravitational scans indicate the world has a low density - Hypothesis: This planet has deep cave systems.
My Hearthian friend has told me that a Nomai escape pod was present on the surface, and that they discovered ancient ruins with fascinating technology.
I have managed to replicate a staff from this planet that allows the wearer to see the unseen.
